评论详情: Are you tired of blending into the crowd? Want to turn heads in every situation—whether at brunch, the office, or your nephew’s baptism? Then let me introduce you to the Va-jay-jay Optical Illusion Pants—the pants that say, “I’m bold, I’m brave, and I have no regrets!”  First things first, these pants ARE comfortable. But let’s get to the star of the show: the seam. Folks, the seam design is… innovative. It’s like someone took “anatomically correct” as a challenge, not a suggestion. Wearing these pants in public will be an adventure. You'll never see so many people do double takes, triple takes, wondering: “Is that what I think it is?” Yes, random stranger, it is!  PROS: Guaranteed icebreaker at parties. Perfect for testing your confidence levels in public. The fabric is so comfy you’ll forget about the chaos happening in the crotch zone. CONS: Your grandma will no longer speak to you. Explaining the design to TSA will be... a journey. Strangers will feel compelled to offer you unsolicited commentary about biology. In conclusion, these pants are for the fearless, the audacious, and anyone who believes fashion should make a statement. Did I return them? Absolutely. Would I recommend them? No, but I’m sure many a camel-toe-leggings-wearing women will love these babies.
Very true to size, I’m a 12-14 and it fits very comfortable. Great thick quality material, perfect length for flats or heels, I’m 5’3” and I do not have to have it altered. Will definitely buy again.
This set is so stylish  It is well made and the material is soft yet thick enough to be warm.  I haven’t washed it yet or worn more than once.  Hoping it doesn’t pull

Pictured is how I styled for a business casual look, but this is set is very versatile, and can be work for casual comfy for airport, and even with sandals for the warmer months. I’m thinking I need this in other colors! 10/10 recommend.

I followed someone on IG who said this was THE BEST travel set! My husband and I are going overseas for our honeymoon, and we’ll be on long flights. Naturally I was looking for something that would be travel-chic…comfortable yet elevating my look from the typical sweatshirt and leggings. If you are short, plus-size, pear or apple shaped, this is not the set for you. The top might have been a little long. The pants sat at my waist which created that awful ring around your mid-section that is just not flattering and definitely does not elongate your figure. From my knee and lower it was a wide leg (which I actually didn’t mind) and due to my height they were a little long. Maybe one day they’ll come out with a set that looks FABULOUS on all body types. Sad to say this will be a return.
